name: UpdateDomainAllowlist
description: Update the organization's domain allowlist to control domain access.

parameters.name: email_domain_allowlist_type
parameters.description: Type of email domain allowlist. Valid value: 'domain_allowlist'.

parameters.name: allowed_domains_list
parameters.description: A list of domains to include in the organization's email domain allowlist.

value_schema.description: The list of domains in the email domain allowlist.

parameters.name: organization_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the organization to update the domain allowlist.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the org.

parameters.name: enable_email_domain_allowlist
parameters.description: Set to true to enable the email domain allowlist for the organization.

value_schema.description: Whether the email domain allowlist is enabled for the org.
